body.p: If a lessee accounts for short-term leases applying paragraph 6, the lessee shall consider the lease to be a new lease for the purposes of this Standard if:

li.p: there is a lease modification; or
there is any change in the lease term (for example, the lessee exercises an option not previously included in its determination of the lease term).
